page.title: 15FRIDAY, JULY 5TH 1985
page.content: Afterwards she followed the usual school timetable with lessons in English, French, History, Geography, Religion and Music before walking home to watch Wimbledon. From 4.45 she mucked out her pony's stable , groomed him and hacked out, returning to feed her pony at 8pm. She went home,had supper, watched TV and went to bed. SUNDAY, JULY 7TH 1985 Mr. Green got up late, thought about gardening but decided to watch his daughter competing in the local horse show instead. After lunch the family watched the men's tennis final at Wimbledon. He and his wife later played golf. He returned home and after a bath and TV, went to bed. His wife drove Rachel to the stables before returning to household chores and preparing a cold Sunday lunch.She telephoned her daughter in France.
